messages.zh: 这是我们的护身符，是我妈妈亲手教我做的......
messages.en: This is our amulet, my mother taught me how to make it……

messages.zh: 给你们的这个是我做的。只要是亲手做的，一定能保证重要的人平安无事。
messages.en: I made this one for you myself. As long as it’s made with your own hands, it will surely keep your dear ones safe.

messages.zh: 嗯，米莎姐姐，我们会好好保管它的！
messages.en: Yeah, Misha, we’ll take good care of it!
Hide yourselves well! Don’t make any sound.

messages.zh: 往哪去了？！你们，追！看那些感染者还能跑多远！
messages.en: Where did they go?! You, look over there! Let’s see how far can those Infected run!

messages.zh: 嗯？这里......看来还有些东西呢？
messages.en: Huh? There……seems to be something here?

messages.zh: ......依据能天使的情报，任务目标一定在这附近逗留过才对......
messages.en: ……According to Exusiai’s information, the mission target should have been around here……

messages.zh: 坏蛋！你们这些坏蛋！放开我！放——开——！
messages.en: Bastards! You bastards! Let me go! Let——GO——!
Tell me! Which way did she go!
Speak up before we go hard on you!

messages.zh: 米莎姐姐！救救我！！龙姐姐！！救——
messages.en: Misha! Help me!! Miss dragon!! Hel——

messages.zh: ——以后别再做些欺压弱小的事情。
messages.en: ——Don’t you ever pick on the weak again.
Alright, it’s okay now, come out.

messages.zh: 这里危险，快去安全点的地方吧。
messages.en: It is dangerous here, get to somewhere safe quickly.
Amiya, have you found the target?

messages.zh: 嗯，我看见她了......她往贫民区更深处去了。
messages.en: Yeah, I saw her……she went deeper into the slum.

messages.zh: 芙兰卡，让附近搜索的干员集合，我们得快点追上去。
messages.en: Franka, gather the searching operators around. We need to catch up quickly.

messages.zh: 阿米娅，搜查小队遭遇了展现出攻击倾向的人，而且不是普通人，是感染者。
messages.en: Amiya, the searching squad encountered hostile targets, and it’s not normal people, but the Infected.

messages.zh: ......让小队向我们目前所在的区域撤退。侦查小队，去追踪目标！注意安全！
messages.en: ……Let the squad retreat to our current position. Reconnaissance squad,go track the targets! Be careful!

messages.zh: 战斗小组，各自隐藏散开。
询问芙兰卡是否要伏击敌人
messages.en: Ask Franka whether to ambush the enemy

messages.zh: ......Dr.{@nickname}可是指挥官，你就不能严肃点吗。
messages.en: ……Dr.___is the commander here, can’t you be more serious?

messages.zh: 攻击罗德岛的感染者......吗。
messages.en: Infected that are attacking Rhodes Island……Huh.
